snippet: Helen Mirren, during intermission, appears in her costume as Queen Elizabeth to berate a group of marching drummers who disrupted a performance of “The Audience.”
abstract: Helen Mirren, during intermission, appears in her costume as Queen Elizabeth to berate a group of marching drummers who disrupted a performance of “The Audience.”

headline.main: Helen Mirren Is Not Amused as Drummers Disrupt Performance

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
